record.title: ELECTING NANCY ERICKSON AS THE SECRETARY OF THE SENATE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I send a resolution to the desk.

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Without objection, the resolution is considered and agreed to.
The resolution (S. Res. 8) was agreed to, as follows:
Resolved, That Nancy Erickson of South Dakota be, and she is hereby, elected Secretary of the Senate.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote.
I move to lay that motion on the table.

record.narrative: The motion to lay on the table was agreed to.
